page.title: 08Sport in St.Helens
page.content: Although the main sport which takes place in St.Helens is rugby league, there are many other sports catered for by local firms as well as the town's Recreation and Leisure Department. Sport's Centres have been set up, where many indoor and outdoor sports take place.There is an "all weather" area in one of the local parks which is used by many local teams,both for games and training sessions. As well as the mainly physical sports there are opportunities for older people to take part in sports such as crown green bowling and snooker,altough you don't have to be old to play them. Other facilities include tennis courts in the parks,two main swimming pools and two golf courses(one private and one public).
